Belgium:
French forces plunder Arlon.
Francis I of France appoints Claude, Duke of Guise as governor of the Duchy of Luxembourg.
Colombia: Francisco de Orellana sails the length of the Amazon River
Cuba: The Spanish crown abandons the encomienda colonial land settlement system.
Ireland: The Irish parliament passes the Crown of Ireland Act, which establishes a Kingdom of Ireland to be ruled by Henry VIII and his successors.
Peru: The Viceroyalty of Peru was established.
Sweden: Nils Dacke starts peasant uprising in Sm√•land, defeated the following year
